text: 7|195|Sihamtara bharai achene yitorae sihamte khoja karhe? Sihamtara hata achene yitorae sihamte dharaiba parae? Sihamtara caku achene yitorae sihamte dekhe? Sihamtara kana achene yitorae sihamte sune? Koraa, ‘tomaloke yisakalaka allahara lagata ansi karaicha sihamtaka ahbana karaa tara pichata mora biraud'dhe sarayantra karaa arau moka akano arakasa nidiba’.
